channel.title: encryption on Andy Ibanez
channel.description: Recent content in encryption on Andy Ibanez

item.title: Simpler File Encryption on iOS
item.description: It’s not news that iOS has a heavy a focus on privacy and security. Apple provides us with many tools to make encryption easy, like CryptoKit, a high-level Cryptography framework on iOS. When CryptoKit is not enough, we can leverage older, lower-level APIs to do more cryptographic operations or use cyphers not covered by CryptoKit. We can even make use of the Secure Enclave to leverage hardware-level security to our apps.
